content.title: neo trio is 354% Funded, Thanks to You!
content.creator:
neo
March 24, 2025
content.content:
Hello Backers!
All thanks to you guys, neo trio is past fully funded! After months of hard work and dedication, Neo Trio has been brought to life!
We are excited to announce travel accessories for the neo trio line up. These will be available as add-ons during the survey collection post-campaign. Add-ons for neo 300 Solar Panel, 100w Wall Plug, neo 122 30w Wall Plug and wall plug adapters for all three models, (Type C, Type I & Type G), will also be available during the post-campaign survey. Additionally, USB-C charging cables will be included with all Neo models.
As requested by some of our backers, here are the neo trio dimensions with weight.
We are excited to say the least! Our team thrilled to finally bring this project to life together with you, our backers! Your feedback is very important to us. Feel free to reach out and be sure to stay in the loop by leaving a comment or contacting us directly! Thank you once again!
team neo
